Research

Research conducted by the group revolves around a number of core themes. These include:

  • Acoustic data analysis and species identification
  • Comparison of acoustic fauna surveys with traditional surveys
  • Citizen science applications for analysis of acoustic sensor data
  • Acoustic indices for rapid biodiversity assessment
  • Automated species identification
